bill.title: Prescription medicine; regulate coverage of by health care service plan contracts and health insurance policies.
bill.description: An Act To Provide That Health Care Service Plan Contracts And Health Insurance Policies That Cover Prescription Drugs Issued, Amended, Or Renewed On Or After January 1, 2013, That Cover Prescription Medicine Shall Not Create Specialty Tiers That Require Payment Of A Percentage Cost Of Prescription Drugs; That Such Contracts And Policies Shall Not Charge A Copayment For Medication In Excess Of Five Hundred Percent Of The Lowest Copayment Required By The Plan For Medications In The Plan's Formulary; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Insurance;Public Health and Human Services
